Primary Contact: Wes Zawertailo, Wellness Development Centre Team Lead; Email: wes.zawertailo@cmha.bc.ca
Volunteer Coordinator: Denise Scott, Volunteer and Event Coordinator; Email: volunteer.kelowna@cmha.bc.ca
Service Details: - Provides a place where individuals dealing with mental health issues can come to connect with others, engage in wellness-based activities, learn and improve mental and physical wellness, and contribute to a vibrant community- Provides opportunities for fitness, recreation, skills-building and socialization- Activities include:  yoga and relaxation, art studio, gardening, arts and crafts, movies and documentaries, skills-building groups, discussion groups on wellness-related topics, community outings such as bowling or swimming
Hours: Office Hours: Mon-Fri: 9:00am - 4:00pm Program Hours:  Tue,Wed,Thu: 11:00am - 3:00pm
How to Apply: A referral is required from a mental health professional or family doctor prior to an intake and orientation appointment * referrals are available on the website or from reception staff
Address & Map: 504 Sutherland AveKelowna, BC     V1Y 5X1View MapQuest Map
